mapper.select: select meeting_notice_id, title ,date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_date, date_format(create_date,'%m-%d') create_date_show from cahg_meeting_notice where status = '0' ORDER BY rank='', rank ASC , create_date DESC limit 0,7

select title,content,author, (select name from sys_dept d where d.dept_id = c.dept_id) dept_name,meeting_file_path,meeting_file_name, date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_date, meeting_time,meeting_place,meeting_dep,meeting_person,meeting_require,meeting_contact from cahg_meeting_notice c where meeting_notice_id = #{meeting_notice_id}

select count(*) from cahg_meeting_notice where status = '0' and 1 = 1
and (title like #{title} OR DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y%m%d') like #{title})

select r.meeting_room_id,r.num,r.name,r.remark,r.status,date_format(r.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as end_time,r.dept_id, (select s.name from sys_dept s where r.dept_id = s.dept_id) as deptname from cahg_meeting_room r

select date_format(r.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as start_time,date_format(r.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as end_time, (select s.name from cahg_meeting_room s where r.meeting_room_id = s.meeting_room_id) as roomName, (select s.name from sys_dept s where r.dept_id = s.dept_id) as deptname from cahg_meeting_his r where DATE_FORMAT(r.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ORDER BY r.start_time
